name: Mage Apprentice
description: A Medium humanoid aspiring spellcaster with average physicality and notable magical capabilities.
memorable: Its ability to deal extra force damage with weapon attacks and its tactical advantage mechanics make encounters unique.
goals: To learn and master magic while demonstrating abilities in combat.
relations: Often seen alongside other apprentices or magical mentors.
environment: Typically found in magical academies or arcane research locations.
strengths: Exceptionally high Intelligence grants powerful spellcasting and ability to boost weapon damage significantly with arcane abilities.
weaknesses: Low armor class makes it vulnerable to attacks, and reckless abilities can expose it to counter-attacks.
attacks: Can attack with a magical dagger dealing significant piercing and force damage, or cast powerful spell attacks like Arcane Bolt.
most_powerful_ability: Arcane Weapons ability allows for extra magical force damage on weapon attacks.
skills: Has average Stealth and Perception skills.
additional_information: Can cast useful utility spells like Mage Hand and Minor Illusion at will.
Possesses a unique ability to gain combat advantage based on its surroundings.
Has access to incapacitating spells like Sleep and Color Spray once per day.
spellcasting: Can cast spell like Mage Hand and Minor Illusion at will; possesses spellcasting abilities that influence combat dynamics.
test_queries: mage that can use Color Spray
